Day-Night-Cycle.description: Lets the plugin control the day-night cycle. May update choppy but allows more control

Allow-Night.description: If the day/night cycle allows night time, skips to morning otherwise

Day-Length.description: How long the day should take in minutes

Night-Length.description: How long the day should take in minutes

Weather-Changes-Per-Day.description: Average time weather switches per day+night (Day+Night = 1h, ChangesPerDay = 4, ChangeTimeVariance = 10, 1h / 4 +- 10 = 5-25m)

Weather-Change-Time-Variance.description: Adds or subtracts number by time of Weather-change-per-day

Weather-Transition-Time.description: Minutes for weather to complete transitioning, run faster to save cpu and network, run slower for better looking/dynamic environments

Use-Plugin-Water.description: Lets plugin control water, allowing tides and flooding. Water is updated very slowly because it can cause lag when touching lots of bricks

Water-Default-Height.description: Height water will default to, 2 is 2x micro

Water-Tide-Range.description: Adds and removes given number of water height during certain times of day. 0 to disable, 2 is 2x micro

Water-Flood-Max.description: Max height floods can reach on top of default water height. 0 to disable, 2 is 2x micro (untested)

Continue-Weather-Dynvar-Reroll.description: Some environment presets have a few dynamic variables that randomly change each weather change, but will they reroll when weather continues (untested)

Enable-Broadcasts.description: Broadcasts for weather changing and possible other future uses
